document_name: Order No. 2014-0668-MEA-SG establishing the composition, and operating procedures of the Steering Committee of the Mali Climate Fund
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/MLI/2014/MLI-2014-07-03-Order No. 2014-0668-MEA-SG establishing the composition, and operating procedures of the Steering Committee of the Mali Climate Fund_ac8803c4a656196d8c9800fba2e60489.pdf
document_description: This Order creates the Steering Committee of the Mali Climate Fund. It regulates the Committee's composition and functions.
